attributes.action: ignore so called 'Climate Change Experts' until they know what they are talking about.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So the flooding is evidence of Climate Change, yet last year we were told to expect hotter drier summers and wetter winters; basically the 'experts' don't know. Mars is warming up the southern hemisphere of Earth has cooled so who knows. So please before taxing us to death and spending billions to combat it, let's be sure of the facts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
